boilerplate: jekyll boilerplate

Aimee | 01 Oct, 2013

Jekyll

Jekyll is a simple, blog aware, static site generator.

Before you start

Make sure that you have :

  • Install Homebrew, also you may need to check this wiki.
  • Install RVM with a ruby: $ \curl -L https://get.rvm.io | bash -s stable --rails --ruby=1.9.3 or --ruby=higher
  • Set up Node.js and npm

** More datails about installing RVM with a Ruby on mac.

How to start

Now, we can easily make it starting just with a line gem install jekyll, also visit and take a look about Jekyllrb. More basic concept of jekyll, you may want to see jekyll and Github pages jekyll.

Run jekyll

$ jekyll serve
